definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Cultures from the samples were grown on two sorts of media.
sentences.chinese: 樣本細菌接著放在兩種不同環境中培養。

sentences.english: Oil "is" extracted from wheat germ bacteria of wheat.
sentences.chinese: 小麥胚芽油是從細菌中提取的小麥籽粒。

sentences.english: Bacteria can be inside an uncracked, whole egg.
sentences.chinese: 細菌也存在於無縫完整的雞蛋內部。

sentences.english: He was laid up for a week by an intestinal bug.
sentences.chinese: 他因爲腸道感染細菌休息了一週。

sentences.english: Dirt, bacteria, and makeup left on overnight can irritate skin, clog pores, and trigger breakouts.
sentences.chinese: 超過一夜的灰塵，細菌和化妝刺激皮膚，堵塞毛孔。

sentences.english: For differentiating bacteria based on liquefaction of gelation.
sentences.chinese: 供鑑別細菌液化明膠用。

sentences.english: The surface hydrophobicity of coal increases by adsorbing nitrifying bacteria and quinoline in surface.
sentences.chinese: 通過吸附硝化細菌和喹啉在表面增加煤的表面疏水性。

sentences.english: The correlationship of bacterium between the middle nasal meatus and ethmoid sinuses is little.
sentences.chinese: 篩竇與中鼻道細菌的相關性較小。
但“納米細菌”是否真正存在呢？

sentences.english: The thermal therapy terminated after the terminal germ seminar.
sentences.chinese: 熱療在期末細菌研討會吿終止了。

sentences.english: So the gene made the worms prefer germ-free locales.
sentences.chinese: 所以，這種基因使這些線蟲選擇沒有細菌的環境。

sentences.english: Salt acts by the osmotic effect of extracting water from the bacterial cell fluid.
sentences.chinese: 鹽能殺死細菌是利用滲透作用將細胞中的水分吸掉。

sentences.english: Whether they develop secondary bacterial infections, and if so, what kinds.
sentences.chinese: 他們是否發生繼發細菌感染，如果有，是什麼種類。

sentences.english: Pyomyoma is thought to result from bacterial seeding of a necrotic fibroid.
sentences.chinese: 膿肌瘤被認爲是壞疽性纖維瘤細菌播散的結果。

sentences.english: Researchers examined the genomes of bacteria belonging to the Vibrionaceae family.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員檢查了屬於弧菌科的細菌基因。

sentences.english: Naturally present bacteria are also involved in the mining industry in bioleaching.
sentences.chinese: 天然存在的細菌也應用於採礦行業的生物浸礦。

definition: within the body/in vivo (vs in vitro)/internal to
to degenerate/to deteriorate/(of food) to go bad/to go off/(geology) metamorphism
to prevent/to take precautions against/to protect/to guard against/precautionary/prophylactic
